home.title: Data Converter Site

colorCard.title: Color Code Converter

description.toUnixTime: Convert human-readable datetime to Unix Time (epoch time)
description.fromUnixTime: Convert Unix Time to human-readable datetime format

color.title: Color Code Converter

errors.invalidDateTime: Invalid datetime format. Please use YYYY/mm/DD HH:MM:SS or ISO 8601 format.
errors.invalidUnixTime: Invalid Unix Time value. Please enter a number.
errors.invalidRGB: RGB values must be between 0 and 255.
errors.invalidAlpha: Alpha value must be between 0 and 255.
errors.invalidHex: Invalid HEX format. Please use #RRGGBB or #AARRGGBB format.
errors.invalidCMYK: CMYK values must be between 0 and 100.
errors.invalidHSL: Hue must be 0-360, Saturation and Lightness must be 0-100.
errors.conversionError: An error occurred during conversion. Please check your input.
errors.systemError: An unexpected error occurred. Please reload the page.
